analysis.description:
Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork3.importBalance (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#627-641):
	External calls:
	- amount = source.balanceOf(account) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#630-631)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- imported (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#632-634)

Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork3.importBalance (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#627-641):
	External calls:
	- amount = source.balanceOf(account) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#630-631)
	- mintAmount = amount - source.lockedBalanceOf(account) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#635-637)
	- unlockTime = source.unlockTimes(account,index) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol)
	- mintAmount = source.lockedBalances(account,index) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol)
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol)
amount in InsightsNetwork2Base.lockedBalanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol#554) is a local variable never initialiazed

InsightsNetwork3.importBalance has external calls inside a loop:
	- unlockTime = source.unlockTimes(account,index) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol)

InsightsNetwork3.importBalance has external calls inside a loop:
	- mintAmount = source.lockedBalances(account,index) (/unique_contracts/0xc72fe8e3dd5bef0f9f31f259399f301272ef2a2d.sol)

	Dangerous comparisons:
